sentences.sContent: The anticyclone weather situations are more favorable than the cyclonic ones.
sentences.sContent_eng: The anticyclone weather situations are more favorable than the cyclonic ones.
sentences.sCn: 反气旋天气情况比气旋天气情况更有利些。

sentences.sContent: Second is anticyclone this happens when winds form a wind system around a high.
sentences.sContent_eng: Second is anticyclone this happens when winds form a wind system around a high.
sentences.sCn: 第二种是反气旋，当围绕高压中心形成风系统时出现反气旋。

sentences.sContent: When the air pressure in a region is higher than its surrounding it is called an anticyclone or an area of high pressure .
sentences.sContent_eng: When the air pressure in a region is higher than its surrounding it is called an anticyclone or an area of high pressure .
sentences.sCn: 当地区的大气压力比其周边高时，便称之为反气旋或高气压。

remMethod.val: anti (相反) + cyclone (气旋) → 反气旋

trans.tranOther: an area of high air pressure that causes calm weather in the place it is moving over
